General.Name: Ihlas Gazetecilik AS
General.Description: Ihlas Gazetecilik A.S. publishes, sells, distributes, and markets newspapers, magazines, books, encyclopedias, brochures, and magazines in Turkish and foreign languages for daily, weekly, and monthly term period in Turkey and internationally. The company was founded in 1970 and is headquartered in Istanbul, Turkey.
General.Address: Ihlas Plaza No.11 A/41, Istanbul, Turkey, 34197
